system.description:
At 2nd level you tap into the hallucinogenic properties of certain mushrooms to enhance your magical abilities. You learn @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.4oruofw2q7gso9hq]{Minor Illusion} as a druid cantrip, and it does not count against your total cantrips known. At the corresponding class levels, the following spells are added to the druid list for you. You always have these spells prepared, and they do not count against your druid spells prepared.

2nd Level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.lxu7vfccmpg4ntno]{Color Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.1046kzuqvlnjtk0x]{Silent Image}

3rd Level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.05w9nzp0kvu94k3h]{Mirror Image}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pzn6tyro9kivey8y]{Magic Mouth}

5th Level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6yuzn2ix28wkvduc]{Hypnotic Pattern}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.h94zy649e1vquc53]{Phantom Steed}

7th Level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.pdvg7c9emjgnib07]{Confusion}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.6y4rq48okutkormg]{Phantasmal Killer}

9th Level: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.jo2vztvypvhqxh5u]{Dream}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.f0lq2ogke9k8f1v9]{Mislead}
